transcript:

Illaingga neenga indha maari pannadheenga pannineenga appdinaa ungalukku visibility kurainjidum.

Customer: Eppdi sir?

Customer: Sari panni kodungga appdinaa neenga indha maari pannineenga appdinaa ungalukku visibility kuraiyudhaam sir adhu appdi dhaan sonnaanga adhu. Naan adhaan avartta sonnaen naanu.

Customer: Illaing sir avar mela edhum illaing sir.
Executive: Okay adhu dhaan second aa ippo kaalaila neenga vandhu oru complaint raise pannirundheenga adhu kooda serndhu innoru complaint um raise aayirundhadhu. Adhu vandhu Kirtan pesinadhukkaaga vandhirukku appdingara maari enakku kaanichudhu. Adhunaala dhaan seri okay ivar edho thappaa pesittaaraa edho like.

Customer: Achcha seri seri avar um adhe dhaan konja neram neenga ticket raise panninaa visibility kuraiyum appdingaraaru adhu. Avar um adhe dhaan sonnaaru. Enakku naan adhaan solttaen general aa solttaen enakku sari pannitteenga naan idhukke naan pogamaattaenga appdintaen. Rendu varushamaa kittathatta sollittu irukkaen. Enakku buyleads illaama dhaan naan indha alavukku ponaen adhu illannaa naan edhukku sir naan poraen adhu? Oru customer naan apply panni kidakkalaannaa avanga enna pannuvaanga? Aduthu enna pannalaam nu solli yosichippaangalae adhu dhaan naanum pannaen adhu general aa.
Executive: Puriyudhingga puriyudhu.
Customer: Enakku sari panni rendu varushamaa kaettuttu irukkaen adhu dhaan sariyaagaadhadhunaalum thirumbi thirumbi.
Executive: Illa namma kaalaila paesumbodhae naan ungalukku clear aa sonnaen ungalukku vandhu paatheenga appdinaa irukkakoodiya prachana enna appdinnu paatheenga appdinaa ungaludaiya idhu vandhu neenga statue pannittu irukkeenga illaiyaa? Ippo naan ungalukku example ku solraen ippo ennudaiya product vandhu blue pen mattum dhaan naan manufacture pannraen nu vachukkonga. Saringga. Ippo ennudaiya category la naan vandhu blue pen appdinnu solli map pannaen appdinaa enakku blue pen la mattum varum. Adhaavadhu product la blue pen nu pottan appdinaa adhukku mattum varum. Naan enna pannuvaen appdinaa blue pen num poduvaen normal pen num poduvaen. Yaen appdinaa pen nu pottalum ennudaiya blue pen promote aaganum blue pen search pannalum en product search aaganum. Idhu basic concept okay vaa? Ippo ungaludhula enna nadandhirukku naa adhe maari ippo neenga vandhu naalu naalanji illa aelueettu vidhaana statue irukku. Statue naariya vagai irukku appdingumbodhu ippo neenga statue ngara normal keyword namma idhula map aayirukku. Normal category map aayirukku. Appo statue nu solli search pannumbodhu namakku vandhu brass um varum adhe maari metal um varum wooden um varum FRP um varum ellaa vagaiyaana idhume varum. Appo indha idathula enna aagum appdinaa ungalukku irrelevancy vara seiyudhu sir. Ippo idhula namakku enna problem appdinaa namakku leads idhula varaama illa namakku market la evvalavu leads irukko adhukku aetha maari leads vandhukittu dhaan irukku. Naan leads ae varala appdinaa namma namma adhu vandhu kandippaa vandhu concern pannalaam. Like idhula last 12 idhula naan fullume eduthu paarthen ungaludhula ungaludaiya usage proper aa irukku proper aana leads umae varudhu. But enna vandhu neenga edhirpaakkara alavukku vandhirukkaannu kaetteenga appdinaa andha alavukku market laiyae illa. Seri sir. Naan solradhu yaenaa ippo market la kammiyaana leads irukkumbodhu namakku varumbodhu leads kammiyaa irukku sir. Naan open aa sonnaa idhu dhaan wooden la market la kammiyaa leads irukkumbodhu namakku leads kammiyaa kaattudhu avvalavu dhaan vishayam. So adhunaala ennudaiya chinna suggestion enna appdinaa ungalukku leads idhula innum vararadhukku enna enna laam work pannannumo adhu ellaamae nadandhirukku nga. Adhula endha prachnaiyum illa okay ngalaa? Ungalukku in case adhula leads illa appdinaa wooden la illa appdingumbodhu neenga en kitta kooda neenga call panni illa message panni direct aa enakku sollunga naan ungalukku leads eduthu kooda anuppuraen. But idhu neenga sollunga. Naan solttungga sir ippo andha blue pen appdingale enakku blue pen mattum irundhaa podhum sir appdingara maari dhaan concept sir. Wooden statue na wooden statue mattum irundhaa podhum enakku. Extra irundhaa vendaam enakku. Puriyudhu sir. Adhu dhaan concept sir naan solla varadhu neenga enakku blue pen mattum dhaan namma idhula keyword irundhaa enakku adhu mattum podhum enakku. Matha edhumae karuppu pen aa udha red colour pen aa adhu edhumae enakku vendaam. Andha maari karuppu statue aa karuppu statue mattum enakku leads aa search pannaa enakku varattum. Wooden statue nu adichaa mattum enakku andha keywords podunga adhu mattum podhum enakku. Brass edhukku kondu varannum sir ngaraen. Adhaavadhu idhula relevant aa irukkanum idhula un-relevant andha neenga solradhu statue la kondu varaan aanaa enakku idhu mattum kondu vandhaa podhungaraen naanu. Yaenaa blue pen naa blue pen mattum irundhaa podhungaraen naanu. Mathapadi pen la vandhu ellaa pen num enakku venaam permanent marker andha sketch indha sketch endha edhum venaam sir. Illaingga ippo ippo neenga solradhu enakku clear aa purinji pochu sir naan ungalukku adha naan ae solla maari dhaan. Idhula leads varumbodhu ellaamae naan ungalukku ungalukku vandhurum andha maari naanga set panniyaachu. Ungalukku prefer pandra neenga enna location aa andha set panniyaachu. Neenga prefer pandra category um set panniyaachu okay ngalaa? Ungalukku in case maximum neenga thadukka vaendiyadhu hmm brass irundhu kaattudhu naa adha neenga edhuvumae pannavaendaam just vitturunga. Metal la irundhu kaattudhu naa vitturunga. Only wood idhula neenga edukka maatteenga theriyum naan just ungalukku remind pannittukkaen. Neenga wooden la mattum edunga ungalukku adhula irundhu leads varamaari naan support pannitturaen. In case ungalukku leads illannaa neenga enakku call pannunga. Seri sir ippo ungalukku naan vaennaa onnu pannraen. Illaing sir ennodaiya idhu paatheenga appdinaa minimum la irukku digit la irukku adhu paatheenga maximum digit la irukku. Adhu dhaan enakku ippo namma seri sir. Minimum ippo wooden statue vandhu minimum digit la varumbodhu brass stone metal idhellaam maximum digit la irukku adhu. Adhu dhaan ippo namma eppdi adhu namma sari adhu dhaan sari pannungannu kaekkiraen naanu. Naan podavaendiyadhu oru vishayam naan ippo sale panna vaendiya enakku andha product namma matha ellaamae maximum digit la irukku. Idhu onnu rendu vandhukittu irukku adhu appdingumbodhu ippo naan eppdi business pannamudiyum sir idhu IndiaMART la naanu? Adhu dhaan naan kaekkiraen naan thirumbi thirumbi naan orae vishayam dhaan thirumbi thirumbi vaera vaera angle la kaettukittu irukkeenga adha. Seri sir puriyudhingga sir. Illa ippo ungalukku andha level ku yaen varala naa market laiyae avvalavu dhaan sir irukku nu artham. Seri sir naan market lae illannalum prachana illa enakku idhu varavaendaangaraen naanu. Seri okay naan market laiyae leads ae enakku oru maasam varalannalum prachana illai sir enakku metal brass nu varavaendaam sir. Metal ae varavaendaam. Metal brass fiber stone POP resin idhellaam thaevai illaadhadhu nga idhu idhellaam maximum digit la vandhukittu irukku. Enakku leads market la evvalavu varudho adhu varattum nga adhukku paathukkaen naan laam ennaala ennaala theriyadhu eppdi varumnu enakku. Seri naan ungalukku yaenaa neenga neenga kandippaa unga side la irundhu konjam leads enakku kandippaa generate panni tharannum appdingumbodhu andha time la enakku varum la adhu ippo enakku varaama irundhaalae enakku adhu avara aarambichirunga enakku. Neenga idhu thaduthuttaa podhum enakku. Idhu idhu idhu mattum naan stop pannannum avvalavu dhaane sir? No issue. Idhu mattum stop aanaa idhaiyae stop panni vitturaadheenga neenga wooden statue full aa. Illaing illaing adhellaam pannamaattaen. Neenga ippo open pannreengalaa appdiyae ungalukku open pannattumaa? Sir ippo bus la poittu irukkaen paesaa mattum dhaan sir mudiyum adhu. Free aayittu koopidunga sir free aayittu koopidunga. Seri okay sir okay okay naan ennudaiya number indha message podraen WhatsApp la en number kke kooda koopidunga okay ngalaa? Seri kandippaa sir okay okay okay thank you sir. Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Visibility decreases if a complaint is raised.

- Wants only wooden statues, not other materials.

- Wants leads in minimum digits.



Resolution:

- Clarified raising tickets does not decrease visibility.

- Explained generic keywords affect visibility.

- Assured support for leads in wooden statues.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will call after he is free.



Alert (If Any):

None

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- visibility, leads, complaints, keywords, statue
